lead_paragraph: Like an ailing heavyweight, Spain and their hopes of a third straight European title ended in a tame surrender as their 2-0 defeat by Italy represented the definitive end to a golden era in their foot balling history.

headline.print_headline: Italy Defeat Shows Spain's Golden Era Gone for Good
headline.main: Italy Defeat Shows Spain's Golden Era Gone for Good

snippet: Like an ailing heavyweight, Spain and their hopes of a third straight European title ended in a tame surrender as their 2-0 defeat by Italy represented the definitive end to a golden era in their foot balling history....
